name: owa_notifications
title: Outlook Web App Notifications: Icon & Popup
description: Add system notifications capability to OWA (Outlook Web App). No configuration needed. When new email arrives into OWA a system notification about this event will be shown. Also the fav icon and document title of the OWA tab are updated to show the number of unread emails.
author: Phil Baranovskiy

preferences.name: delayBetweenChecks
preferences.title: Seconds to wait between checks
preferences.description: Controls how fast new emails are dettected and notifications will appear. Lower value means faster reaction.
